backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, and access control with storage mixins and ordered maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a cache‑busting change in frontend/index.html to its feature ID and involved components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache‑busting meta headers and versioned main.tsx script loader.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app router setup defining lobby, chatroom, and admin routes with layout logic for header and footer visibility.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Avatar picker dialog supporting file uploads, Giphy search, and avatar removal with debounced search and request tracking.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Chat area UI handling message display, auto‑scrolling, replies, pinned video, and sending messages using backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Renders a chatroom preview card, fetching thumbnails for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter content and displaying media, status, and metadata.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Provides a modal for creating chatrooms with fields for metadata and media, including upload, video URL validation, and Twitter embed preview.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying attribution text and a link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with navigation, avatar selection, and inline username editing.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: No-op placeholder component intentionally rendering nothing.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Displays individual chat messages with reactions, media embeds, replies, and optional Twitter widget loading.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Message composer supporting text, image upload, YouTube/Twitch/Twitter URLs, and voice recording.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Shows a pinned YouTube or Twitch video with an option to unpin it.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React component providing audio playback with waveform visualization, duration tracking, and synchronized pause across multiple players.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Hook returning a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Hook that forces cleanup and refetching of chatroom data when the actor becomes ready, with bounded recovery for empty caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for chatrooms, messages, and user data, including local helpers and post-create safeguards.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles, theme variables, mobile input fixes, and custom voice message slider styling.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides a compact number formatting utility (k/M/B).
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from Giphy and map API responses into simplified GIF objects.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty placeholder file for html2canvas loader logic.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Implements client-side image compression with resizing, quality control, and progress reporting.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty placeholder for Twitter embed rendering utilities.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed data to extract safe preview fields with caching and request deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed previews with validation, expiration, and cache key generation.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty placeholder for Twitter thumbnail utilities.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching logic.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Provides utilities for extracting video or post IDs from YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs and generating related thumbnail or embed URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page that authenticates via password and allows deletion and management of chatrooms with React Query data handling.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Loads a chatroom by ID, handles loading and error states, increments view count once, and renders the ChatArea once data is available.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Displays and filters chatrooms using search and category queries, manages debounced search, handles loading/error states, and provides navigation and create-room UI.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, issues, and feature requests focused on ensuring production cache-busting for updated lobby behavior.
